name: Mind Wall
description:
- Ludumdare 48 Winner -
- 2009 IGF China finalist -

Mind Wall is a unique 3D arcade puzzler that is instantly understood, beautifully simple to control, and diabolically difficult to master.

Tap a cell on the advancing wall to remove it so your shape can fly through before you crash!

Features:

• Randomly generated levels for unlimited replayability
• Unlockable “Gauntlet Mode” with online leaderboard
• Unlockable “Gauntlet DX Mode” with online leaderboard
• Unlockable shape editor
• Haunting original stereo soundtrack
• Created by award winning game designer Seth A. Robinson (Legend Of The Red Dragon, Dink Smallwood, Growtopia)
